name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。

2　　What is translation?:Cross-cultural translation problems
3     　　Translation: skills and strategies I
4     　　Translation: skills and strategies II

7    　　Translation: Theory and practice II (practical texts: advertisement)
8    　　Translation: Theory and practice I (practical texts: brochure)
9    　　Translation: Theory and practice II (practical texts: brochure)

12   　　Translation and business II

14   　　Translation and media: subtitling II
15   　　Translation and media: subtitling III
16   　　Translation and media: subtitling IV
17   　　Group presentation and discussion I
18   　　Group presentation and discussion II
